metadata.title: CVE-2023-52578 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:bridge: use DEV_STATS_INC() syzbot/KCSAN reported data-races inbr_handle_frame_finish() [1] This function can run from multiple cpuswithout mutual exclusion. Adopt SMP safe DEV_STATS_INC() to updatedev->stats fields. Handles updates to dev->stats.tx_dropped while we are atit.
